mapper.insert: insert into insurance_info (id, plate_no, insurance_no, insurance_company, insurance_person, insurance_person_tel, comp_ins_no, comp_ins_money, comp_ins_start, comp_ins_end, busi_ins_no, busi_ins_money, busi_ins_start, busi_ins_end, total, deltag, companyId) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insurancePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insurancePersonTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compInsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compInsMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{compInsStart,jdbcType=DATE}, #{compInsEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, #{busiInsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiInsMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{busiInsStart,jdbcType=DATE}, #{busiInsEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deltag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select id, plate_no, insurance_no, insurance_company, insurance_person, insurance_person_tel, comp_ins_no, comp_ins_money, comp_ins_start, comp_ins_end, busi_ins_no, busi_ins_money, busi_ins_start, busi_ins_end, total, deltag, companyId from insurance_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, plate_no, insurance_no, insurance_company, insurance_person, insurance_person_tel, comp_ins_no, comp_ins_money, comp_ins_start, comp_ins_end, busi_ins_no, busi_ins_money, busi_ins_start, busi_ins_end, total, deltag, companyId from insurance_info where 1=1
